website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a natural remedy to many ailments or issues, look no further than this strong peppermint oil.
pros: This is a strong essential oil that works well as a natural remedy
Is useful in clearing acne, warding of mice and other pests, stimulating hair growth, ridding nails of fungus, curing warts, promoting healthy digestion, and many other uses
cons: This is a smaller bottle, so the quantity is less than other options

customer_reviews.title: The field mice seem to be gone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle for field mice eradication in my clean finished garage. Not being one for the scent of peppermint, this product's scent is ultra pure therefore I don't mind it. It is rather pleasant. Three weeks later, after multiple sprinkled applications around the garage, there are no visible signs the mice are around, I believe this was the best humane method of getting rid of them. There is a lingering scent that will dissipate in due time. In the meantime, the scent is refreshing. I may keep the scent going to discourage any more field mice. Highly recommend this pure pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint Essential Oil-- by Healing solutions
customer_reviews.text: When I buy Peppermint Oil-- I want it to smell like peppermint, and ONLY PEPPERMINT!!! . This one does not. They add something to it that overpowers the peppermint and it stinks. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Scott

customer_reviews.title: Use for dry scalp condition and loss of hair.  It works.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use for pain but for scalp condition. Was losing a lot of hair from my diet plan. I add this to rosehip oil and almond oil prior to washing hair. Let set one half hour and work well into scalp. Amazing that I see no more hair in my drain. Feels great!!! After washing hair looks better too.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiB

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint for Energy. Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Peppermint essential oil in my difusser at home it has given me energy like i had never felt before and no more headaches!!. I used to suffer from sinus (headaches, sleppiness and low energy) but since I started with 4 drops in my difusser per day, it gives a deliciousness smell to my home and i feel awesome good and energized . Thanks to Dr. Axe recommendations i started using this essential oil and it really works! Now I'm also trying other ones for other purposes. This brand I really love it. It says therapeutical grade which is what is recommended. Try it out. Naturally good.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana MdA

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my stuffy nose almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I shook the little bottle and put my nose very close to the open spot on the top of the open bottle. I sniffed twice and then twice again. My stuffy nose very, very soon, cleared a great deal. I did this right before I went to bed and I slept well most of the night. The fragrance is not overly strong or offensive, it just cleared my head and left a slight peppermint fragrance. I actually was told this help relieve mild depression. I am under the care of a doctor and take a low milligram anti depressant 1 x a day. Does anyone know about the effect of peppermint oil on depression?
customer_reviews.author: Sauerkraut

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the headaches away and many more...
customer_reviews.text: I`ve been wanting to purchase peppermint oil for some time and decided that it was my time now. I found this product at a good price and size since I`m quite new to using any herbal oils. The peppermint oil has a strong scent that I find is relaxing. On the bottle there is a warning label to dilute the oil if it`s too strong because the minty-ness can be sensitive to people with sensitive skin. It is also versatile because I also bought this for warding off mosquitoes in which I have gotten bitten a lot from them during the hot and humid summers. Overall I would recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is sooooo soothing. I will purchase again. It is a lovely quality (in my opinion), a little goes a long way. I would recommend it. I actually want to sleep when I smell it. Great to use with a diffuser, or add to your cleaners or shampoo. Leaves your fridge smelling awesome, garbage disposal, or bins. Your space feels so refreshing and clean. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Not a Pleasant Peppermint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this peppermint oil because I absolutely LOVE the lavender scent by this company but this oil did not hit the mark for me. I can’t put my finger on it but it almost seems too ‘sweet’, maybe. It’s not a true, strong peppermint. It’s not terrible, it’s just not what I was looking for. I prefer Nature’s Truth peppermint over this. That one has a strong, pure peppermint scent & I mix that with the Healing Solution’s Lavender and use in my bath with epsom salt & baking soda. I feel that scent combo seems to work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: stacia76

customer_reviews.title: Not As good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for awhile and it has smelled great and worked wonderfully. However, this last order is terrible. It has no peppermint smell and it is no effective. Its almost like the peppermint was left out. Normally this would be 5 stars, maybe I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This Peppermint oil smells amazing!! I’ve used it in my diffuser and also on a cotton balls. You only need a few drops, as other brands I’ve tried you need 1/2 the bottle to even smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean, long lasting scent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Chakra Bracelet. I put it into the volcano beads that absorb the scent and use it as aroma therapy to relax all day. The scent is very clean peppermint and it lasts for a good while. Though it slowly fades as the day progresses it does last a few hours and even at the end of the day the lingering scent is light, but still present. I love it and will be ordering again... for those curios, it doe not have that strong herbal smell that some others' I've tried had. It is a very clean and present peppermint smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with muscle aches
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the target market for this kind of stuff, but wanted to try it out as I get occasional tension in my face and head that appears to be muscular. Thought this was worth a shot. It seems to help, which surprised me. I hesitate to give it 5 stars, but if you're looking for a natural way to help head and muscle aches, this can't hurt (I don't think...)
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Great product for repelling mosquitoes and other insects from wanting to stay inside the area where you're diffusing the peppermint. The bottle is also good since it doesn't over spill the liquid out like a different product I tried had, I'd recommend getting this if you have an essential oil diffuser and an insect problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dakarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mice and Bug Repellent
customer_reviews.text: I use it to repel mice. Works for 30 days then I put more on a cotton ball and place them were mice try to enter.
customer_reviews.author: HipsNChips

customer_reviews.title: Nice to go natural
customer_reviews.text: Discovered it really helps keep mosquitoes away..I ve made a spray and use it daily..my entire patio aarea Works great on the kids I watch too.. Nice not having to spray chemicals on them..plus it says me a lot of money too... Seems to work as well as any bug sprays I’ve purchased..wish I would have know about oils when my kids were little
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: A little small, can't squeeze, but good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to a solution in a spray bottle as a natural bug repellant, and I couldn't squeeze out the number of drops I wanted (either with a dropper or the bottle itself) and the oz/bottle was much smaller than I was expecting but a few drops was all it took for a strong peppermint smell, which I liked. Fine deal for the money I guess since oils are typically more expensive - so it solved what I needed it for, for the price, at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: d_papa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I've used other peppermint oils in the past and kept meaning to get one for myself. I finally did and love this. The scent is great, it fades rather quickly (within 30) but it still does the trick and alleviates any sinus pressure or headaches I have. It opens up any congestion in my nose as well which really helps during allergy season. Though the scents fades a bit quick, when I need to I can just dab on a bit more and be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This cannot be pure peppermint oil - it doesn’t even smell like it. I bought it because I get relief from mosquito bites by using peppermint oil and this was watery and did not work. I had to pour it in a bottle that better controlled how much comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. It smells more like spearmint than peppermint. I have a different brand of essential oils and the peppermint smells better on the other brand than this one. But we will probably still use this one.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: smells like off peppermint
customer_reviews.text: i have a very good quality one that smells very nice, i tried the cheap one bc i wanted to see if it was really a difference, and well it is, this one smelled rancid.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Necessary ingredient
customer_reviews.text: Used as scent for homemade hand sanitizer... works great... FYI 2/3 cup 70% alcohol, 1/3 cup aloe Vera gel and 8-10 drops of essential oil!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gore Bryte

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Challenging dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I trust this brand now. Dispensing it with a Worcester sauce style cap is taxing me. No way to direct where the drops are going it even how many drops. I've been trying to scheme an eye-dropper contraption after a transfer to a different bottle. Again, the product itself is fantastic and worth fighting for.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Zorro

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, this product. Its essential oil is divine. I use it for stomach problems and it works great. Just a few drops in my drink and aches and pain seem to disappear. I also. Use it for other medicinal uses. I make sure I always have this product in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good strong scent — worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I got peppermint oil because I had read it will keep mice out of your pantry. It does not get rid of mice if you already have an infestation, but if you want to keep them from getting in, it’s useful. All I can see is it worked for me. Some folks say peppermint oil doesn’t do anything, but it definitely does.
customer_reviews.author: clonsheefior

customer_reviews.title: Only essential oil that does not cause a headache!
customer_reviews.text: Not really an essential oil person, but finally broke down and tried this to help keep mosquitoes away from our outside dining area. It worked!! Love it so much, I brought it in my home. Oils always gave me headaches, but surprisingly, this product does not give me headaches and the cost is amazing!! Quick delivery time too, which was a real plus when I ran out last week. Scent is not too strong, but not too weak. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to repel cockroaches, I'm not sure if it's working but I love this stuff so much! Only a few drops and the entire room smells like a peppermint patty. Really nice smell! Call us crazy but my partner and I both think it makes us feel energized! Will be buying more from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Le

customer_reviews.title: Great for distracting you when trying to break a habit
customer_reviews.text: I've used this after my pain doctor suggested it. I trigger neuropathways that block pain receptors. It helped me greatly reduce my pain medication. It also helps me when I am dieting. The tiniest amount on my mustache keeps me distracted through pain relief cravings as well as food cravings.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pantazi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for oil diffuser - smells so wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This smells AMAZING in my diffuser. It's so clean and fresh smelling. I have been expermenting with adding either lavender or Eucalyptis along with the peppermint. Seems to be great quality oil, and your house will smell so fresh and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: melreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bug repellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a spray bottle with water and it works great as an insect repellent. I noticed a big difference in bugs and they won't linger long with this stuff. I use it in my humidifier and I also use it in an oil diffuser. It has a lot of benefits. I really love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium oil for excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a long time connoisseur of essential oils & use peppermint oil very regularly. This was my first purchase of this particular brand- and I must say I am very impressed! It is closely comparable to a couple of the other higher end more pricier oils. I will certainly be ordering again!:-)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Natural spider repellent!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my diffuser and as a spider repellent. I live in a basement unit and spiders are everywhere-I regularly woke up with spider bites all over my body. When I woke up with two quarter sized spider bites on my face, I decided it was time to fight back. I mixed this with water and sprayed it along all my windows and doors, and in spots that I felt like spiders might like to hide in. I've done it twice over the course of a few months and I've only gotten one spider bite in my sleep since!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: good product,bad quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but,when I received the last bottle,the cap was broken and the inside insert was not even attached. The bottled emptied and leaked into the box with everything else I ordered....not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Paschopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Check seals on packaging
customer_reviews.text: Scent gets a rave review... packaging did not do as well. Upon opening the box I smelled heavy mint. The outer plastic packaging was still sealed, the cardboard cylinder was intact, but soaked in oil. The twist off seal was broken and the lid was loosened. The bottle lost a third of the volume, but same day del. And 5+$ its not the biggest complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Great Mosquito repellent!
customer_reviews.text: I use this Pepperment Oil as a mosquito repellent. They hate the smell of pepperment. I just rub some on my arms, hands, legs & neck without diluting. It is a great natural way to keep from getting mosquito bites.
customer_reviews.author: Cat1Lady

customer_reviews.title: Decent so far!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it very long, but bought it to use in my diffuser. It does have a nice scent to it. Just not as strong as others I've tried. I still enjoy it though! May try using it for other things later. The price wasn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint Oil Good to Keep Spiders Out
customer_reviews.text: I had read that peppermint oil was good to keep spiders out. While the peppermint oil didn't keep out all the spiders, it did help quite a bit. Spiders apparently do not like the smell of peppermint oil. The oil is good to keep most spiders out plus it makes the room smell really good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff...
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this with a mix of other oils to make something to help with cold & cough, but I love the smell of it by itself as well. I also use it when I begin to get bad headaches or sinus pain too.
customer_reviews.author: JadedFae

customer_reviews.title: Good Oil!
customer_reviews.text: The scent on this product is amazing and just a little dab on the temples works wonders for a headache. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because when I opened the package there was oil all over the outside of the bottle. This wore away the label on the bottle and was messy. Other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Strong nice scent
customer_reviews.text: My sister was feeling very bloated so i told her to try the peppermint e.o . I applied 2 drops to her palm and told her to rub it around her abdomen for a few minutes. She was in the garage when she applied the oil and let me tell y'all... the whole house smells like peppermint!! Lol it's a strong smell but it smells nice and clean! Will update later to see if it worked for her !
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Good Enrichment Tool for animals and Headache Cure too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for enrichment for the Tigers and wild cats where I volunteer at since they like the smell of peppermint but it also works GREAT for headaches. I carry this with me everywhere so when I have a headache rub it on your temples and it helps out quickly and no taking medicine for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Blahh

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, clean scent and taste-Arrived promptly with no issues
customer_reviews.text: PURPOSE: I used this for a homemade mouthwash. PROS: Arrived same day shipping and delivery without any issues or damages. Has a clean, fresh scent and taste. CONS: None. OVERALL: I am a happy customer. Will def be returning for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: SoaringEagle

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing! Nature provides all we need
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff right here, I use it in baths with salt to relax, as a cleanser, deodorizer, it's amazing! Nature provides all we need, we just have to smarten up.
customer_reviews.author: Omnistalgic

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird feeder problem
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this little bottle a 10! I have hummingbirds. This year their feeder was being taken over by flies and horrible wasps. They would attack this tiny birds and, too often, chase them away. In searching on Mr. Youtube, one person mentioned using Peppermint oil, rubbing some on feeder. IT WORKS! My hummingbirds are happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: over 70

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Great essential oil for need. I mix with 6 drops of it, 6 drops lemon and 6 drops lavender in a spray bottle with 1 cup water and a glut of dawn detergent. Shake and spray around door ways, mop boards once a week. Eradicated spiders naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Clean scent helps keep water bugs away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep away water bugs that began showing up in my apt . I still during damp , warm days get 1 in the bathtub so it’s not perfect . If you want clean scent no toxic sprays from exterminator this is worth a try .
customer_reviews.author: kathie fox

customer_reviews.title: Broken they don’t wrap with protection.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Glass was broken and everything leaked out was not packaged with any protection. The smell was strong and true and it would have been perfect if it didn’t all pour out too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Over price .
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 100% essential oils for decades and these are very over price and not a strong enough smell as they should be in my opinion. Peppermint should be a strong potent scent.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Best one for migraines it's really good but There was one I purchased a month ago it wasn't like peppermint it was like spearmint or it was way too diluted and usually it's not so I could not use that peppermint nor could I return it because I opened it
customer_reviews.author: A-N-P

customer_reviews.title: Typical oil
customer_reviews.text: Typical candy cane smell I got for my migraines and to deter roaches. Works fine to assign with migraine management. Not super thick and not too thin that it drips. lightweight so i don't really feel it. Used on cotton balls to out in corners where we have roaches. Don't have any feedback yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Febles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dandruff
customer_reviews.text: Nice tiny little bottle, i use it to put on my scalp for dandruff. Wash it out in the morning and it's good for a while. It's definitely potent because i gotta wash my hands right after use or everything is going to burn that i touch, so definitely not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Energy Boosting!
customer_reviews.text: If you need energy, mental clarity, and want to relieve stress NOW - put a drop of this peppermint oil on your finger and rub on your upper lip. Then breathe in deeply for a bit. You’ll feel pep in your step immediately!
customer_reviews.author: G & E

customer_reviews.title: Bug repellent
customer_reviews.text: Peppermint is known for keeping insects at bay, especially spiders! I put drops of this along my baseboards in the basement. It also keeps the area smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Dorilu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my own hand sanitizer and the smell is strong, which is good! It lingers and it smells straight up like peppermint. I got everything in a bag and in a box. Everything went well 🙂
customer_reviews.author: NIKA CHA

customer_reviews.title: WHAT PEPPERMINT OIL?
customer_reviews.text: I received this broken so all the oil was inside the plastic and caused the sticker to come off. I opened it and immediately burned my eyes and it was still sealed so I figured some would be there and its none. A whole chunk of glass fell out the top when I opened it and its empty! Thanks for nothing. I been having so many issues with my Amazon delivers it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nay D.

customer_reviews.title: mice deterrant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a deterrent to mice in my rv van. So far I haven't used it, but have heard great success stories preventing mice in vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a home remedy for spiders. Not only does my front porch smell amazing, but I haven't seen a spider since I've started using it. Since it's outside, I keep a spray bottle handy for after it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peppermint oil to use with my all-purpose vinegar cleaning spray in order to mask the vinegar scent. 1/2 water 1/2 vinegar, 20 drops of peppermint oil, and 10 drops of lavender oil, and you have a great smelling and very effective all-purpose disinfectant cleaner that can be used on almost any non-porous surface from counter tops, to appliances, to floors, to glass, and so much more. It also works really well at deodorizing stinky garbage disposals and drains.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of spiders!
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I found a spider in my house. It’s summer and they are out and about. This worked great mixed with water and a spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint???
customer_reviews.text: I rely on reviews so I think it's important to be honest. I don't know if aromas are subjective but this tiny bottle didn't even resemble peppermint to me. As a couple of others have said it is closer to menthol and IMO not particularly pleasant. I compared it to peppermint extract which has a nice peppermint smell. I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Many Use Peppermint Oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil can be diluted for use. I apply to rash and itchy scalp. Also, great for mosquito and bug spray when diluted in spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I use it to put a few drops in the toilet to help my 2.5 yr old son poop. Peppermint is supposed to relax the muscles to help aid in going number 2. We call it his magic oil and tell him it helps the poop come out nice and easy. And this helps him use the potty as he is newly potty trained.
customer_reviews.author: tk2014

customer_reviews.title: As Described....
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this peppermint oil is not overpowering but a mild peppermint scent. In other words, it won't give you a headache! Will purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a scent in our RV as a mouse repellent. It smells great and does last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent, not too strong but hardy. I need more time to answer the other questions
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Scent is overwhelming!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to put a drop in my face mask and it’s so strong my eyes watered and I couldn’t breathe!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Guanti

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell! I used it to kill ants. It's a safer way of doing it. Just add water.
customer_reviews.author: Mireya

customer_reviews.title: Great ant repellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it to repel ants in kitchen. Use just a few drops under base cabinets. Works! Pet friendly.
customer_reviews.author: TweedleDee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Smells better than the one i've been buying in stores. Works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps Relieve Cough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as natural alternative to cough meds for me and my kids. Cough meds can easily be abused or children over medicated so I'm always looking to prevent colds via hand washing, xtra citrus fruit and going to be early a few days a week. When the kids do get a cough I use a cool humidifier for a few days. I add this in the humidifier water and it relieves coughs in about 48 hours. A staple for my family.
customer_reviews.author: CherylDiana

customer_reviews.title: Best oil!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and authentic peppermint. This reminds me of the peppermint I used when I was child when my mother was selling her Nature Sunshine products....this is some good oil and it works wonders. Used it in our diffuser for my kids when their allergies are bothering them and it the next day they feel better with little to no allergy symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smell and good size.
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this oil is very nice and fits the description of peppermint perfectly. I recommend only using 2 or 3 drops because it is very strong. It came in a good sized bottle and is easy to use for diffusers.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain.family

customer_reviews.title: Besy Peppermint Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the one Peppermint oil that is as described and the BEST one you can buy. Pure, clean fragrance that lasts and does not get lost when added to other ingredients. Love this one.
customer_reviews.author: John HuffTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. It helps with my headaches and it's apart of my cleaning mixture and sanitizer. I mix with other essential oils
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Very potent aroma. Really opens the sinuses too.
customer_reviews.author: J V Byer

customer_reviews.title: Corona Mask
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 drops, one in each corner of my corona mask, and I love it! Gives me sense of cooling. It doesn’t last for a whole work day, but it lasts throughout the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Seems good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like really good quality and super potent I put it in my shampoo and conditioner for hair regrowth and stimulation I just started using it but I can already feel the tingle so hopefully it works
customer_reviews.author: megan zins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oils!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not disappointed at all with this product! The scent is very strong, not watered down or weak. I was worried how it would be since the price was so affordable- but I purchased both the peppermint and orange and love them both! I Will definitely be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as part of a trial of making your own floor cleaner. The floor cleaner was not a success, but the peppermint scent is lovely. I'll find another use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery, and works good in my diffuser!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi W

customer_reviews.title: Spider Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep spiders out! I use it in a room spray to deter spiders. I love the way it smells and mix it with lavender and rose oils.
customer_reviews.author: Dune

customer_reviews.title: Great mint smell
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a diffuser at night. Awesome mint smell. I have ordered this product a few times and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn t smell. So, useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn t smell, product did NOT satisfy me at all. As “essence” should be VERY strong. And it is NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds are forever

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Helps relieve stomach discomfort and muscle pain. Can be a little potent. Mix with olive oil or coconut oil when using.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: love it strong minty smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for my facial spa steamer to add fragance an also unclog my stuffy nose an for nasal congestion it works wonder clears up my sinuses perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Red

customer_reviews.title: Can barely smell this in the diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why, but I can barely smell this at all in the mist diffuser. I had just run out of my ArtNaturals peppermint oil and went to this one and there was a major difference in potency. Smells great straight from the bottle but I had to go right back to ArtNaturals for another bottle of stronger smelling peppermint for my diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: BDrZ

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint Pattystic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a nice scent for a homemade spray works for what I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to repel mice in my attic. Worked like a charm!!! And, it smells wonderful. I keep the empty bottle in my pocket now for whenever I want a whiff of peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: Parade of Homes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is very pure and lasts a long time. The price is reasonable too, which is great because I use it many of my diffuser blends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Great for Migraines
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when I had a horrible migraine and thankful it was delivered the next day. It's the only thing that helps ease my migraines. I used a little bit behind my ears, on my temples, and massage some onto my shoulders. It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Regina6

customer_reviews.title: Makes my room smell like Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with a diffuser and the result is amazing, smells great and keeps some of those crawly critters away from my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Alexander Meza

customer_reviews.title: I borrowed a friend's much more expensive brand to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed a friend's much more expensive brand to see how peppermint helped with my headaches. It worked well, but I didn't want to spend $40+ on her brand so I tried this one. I can tell a difference, but this one works just as well at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stuff
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best essential oil I've purchased on Amazon. Great smell, and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Would definitely purchase again! It was everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jcroci7

customer_reviews.title: Was not very strong
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt as strong as it said and the the smell didnt last very long very small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: patty smith

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty good, but the smell disappears very fast as well after I heat it up.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good, but the smell disappears very fast as well after I heat it up.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love my peppermint! Smells good and last long for diffuser. Great when allergies or headache is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Great size to keep in your purse or next to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size to keep in your purse or next to your bed on your nightstand. I use pure peppermint oil for my headaches/migraines.. I also take prescription medication but the combo of meds and mint oil helps a LOT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells really good like you can tell it’s a great product I haven’t used it yet because I’ll be using it for my hair but I will give an update when I do but it smells great and it came in a little package, it was packaged well, it did not leak or break, it’s glass
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: A really well priced Essential Oil. If you saw a comparison to this at say Whole Foods, it would easily be $24.99. We run it in our diffuser to help with a calming, nice smelling environment and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: TheFurnitureGuy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small but nothing wrong
customer_reviews.text: Probably didn’t need this but this internet told me this will help keep spiders out of areas. Seems to have helped or been neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K.

product_meta.title: Peppermint Essential Oil - 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Peppermint Oil - 10ml
feature_bullets: The most UNIQUE and AMAZING SMELLING Peppermint on the market, in our opinion. If you are not ABSOLUTELY amazed, receive a full refund from the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, no questions asked!

SUPERIOR EXPERIENCE: If you are just trying our Peppermint for the first time and you do not switch to it permanently as your new favorite oil the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, will refund your money, guaranteed.

PURE + RIGOROUS QUALITY TESTING & CONTROLS: Distillation facility is GMP, ISO 9001 and Kosher certified. Make sure ALL oils you buy have these qualifications * CHECK OUT OUR REVIEWS!! * In our opinion our oil is superior to organic and THE MOST RARE, BEST SMELLING, AND MOST THERAPEUTICALLY EFFECTIVE OF ALL Peppermint (Mentha piperita)
Healing Solutions is SUPERIOR because it offers over 170 different oils for blending/pairing.
